hero.title: AppArt Agent
hero.subtitle: Make smarter apartment purchasing decisions with AI-powered insights

priceAnalysis.title: Price Analysis
priceAnalysis.description: Compare asking prices with real market data from French DVF records. Know if you're getting a fair deal.

documentAnalysis.title: Document Analysis
documentAnalysis.description: AI-powered analysis of PV d'AG, diagnostics, and financial documents to uncover hidden costs.

riskAssessment.title: Risk Assessment
riskAssessment.description: Identify potential issues like amiante, plomb, and poor DPE ratings before you commit.

costCalculator.title: Cost Calculator
costCalculator.description: Comprehensive annual cost estimates including charges, taxes, and upcoming works.

styleVisualization.title: Style Visualization
styleVisualization.description: Upload photos and use AI to visualize renovation potential and style transformations.

investmentScore.title: Investment Score
investmentScore.description: Get a comprehensive investment score and data-driven recommendations for each property.

step1.title: Enter Address
step1.description: Input the apartment address and basic details

step2.title: Upload Documents
step2.description: Upload PV d'AG, diagnostics, and financial documents

step3.title: AI Analysis
step3.description: Our AI analyzes everything and compares with market data

cta.title: Ready to make smarter property decisions?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of smart buyers in France

footer.tagline: Helping you make informed property decisions in France

dashboard.subtitle: Manage your properties and analyze potential investments

properties.title: Your Properties

empty.title: No properties

properties.deleteFailed: Failed to delete property. Please try again.

propertyForm.title: Add New Property
propertyForm.subtitle: Enter the property details to start your analysis

location.title: Property Location
location.noAddressesFound: No addresses found. Please try a different search term.

propertyForm.failed: Failed to create property. Please try again.

simpleTooltip.title: Simple Analysis
simpleTooltip.whatItDoes: Shows only sales at the exact same address (same building).

steps.findSales: Finds all historical sales at your building number
steps.detectOutliers: Detects and flags outliers using IQR method
steps.calculateAvg: Calculates average market price per m²
steps.rawPrices: Uses raw historical prices (no time adjustment)

simpleTooltip.bestFor: Best for: Buildings with recent sales history. Shows true transaction prices in your building.

trendTooltip.title: Trend Analysis
trendTooltip.whatItDoes: Projects 2025 value using market trends from neighboring addresses.

steps.takeSale: Takes most recent sale at your exact address
steps.analyzeNeighboring: Analyzes sales from neighboring buildings (±2, ±4, ±6, etc.)
steps.accountTime: Accounts for time and market evolution

trendTooltip.bestFor: Best for: Properties with older sales data. Estimates current value based on neighborhood trends.

comparables.title: Comparable Sales ({total} total, {included} included)
comparables.individualUnits: Individual Units ({count} lots in this transaction)
comparables.groupedNote: Note: Individual prices/m² shown above are calculated per lot. The grouped price/m² ({price}) is the correct market price for the entire transaction.

marketTrend.title: Market Price Evolution
marketTrend.outliersExcluded: {count, plural, one {# outlier excluded} other {# outliers excluded}} for accuracy
